channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1471291529348235266
item.description:
I will ALWAYS continue to update Twitter between 7:00 AM and 12:00 noon. FREE. Every day. Including stat holidays.
Open data is WILDLY important to me.

item.title: #fr @ 1471199504397393922
item.description:
L'autorité des transports de Londres (TFL) publie chaque année un rapport d'activité bourré d'informations (267 pages). Je rêve d'avoir la même chose pour les grandes villes françaises (avec de l'open data) 🚍🚲🧍‍♀️🚘
https://t.co/VKjgCR2rqF https://t.co/rqivDJ7R6G

item.title: #en @ 1471173456221851653
item.description: The @MTA 2020-2024 capital program amendment being approved by the MTA Board today is a PDF image file and is not machine readable. This type of info can and should be #opendata. Also, where is the full document that CPRB will see? https://t.co/HhfxMzJ6oC https://t.co/scMgsU6pgA

item.title: #en @ 1471169552021168128
item.description: I often get asked what is the best way to share your data. Now @theAGU has tons of resources for doing so. You can even email datahelp@agu.org to get a live person to chat with. What an awesome #OpenData resource. #AGU21 https://t.co/FjXyh0OA2j

item.title: #pt @ 1471076379089412097
item.description: Em fim, fica meu desabafo. Pois a falta de dados abertos prejudica a todos. O que está acontecendo está muito mal explicado, porém mais importante que a causa é o retorno urgente dos sistemas e dados.

item.title: #de @ 1471052321450860551
item.description: Endlich fertig: Meine Webapp #Altiswiss ermittelt den Standort, zeigt die interpolierte Meereshöhe sowie (in iOS kompassrichtig) die nächstgelegene Ortschaft an. Die Pfeiltasten ermöglichen die Anzeige weiterer nahegelegener Orte. https://t.co/oaNEpxwUyE #opendata #openglam https://t.co/uPuYFVLllq

item.title: #und @ 1471049532314165251
item.description: Kako je moguće da nisu znali? Pre 5 dana kada su je uključili, ona je automstski krenula da emituje podatke na Open data, i pojavila se u aplikacijama. Ali ne i na sajtu SEPA i njihovoj aplikaciji. Čim su videli našu objavu, nastala je panika i odmah su isključili stanicu. ⬇️

item.title: #es @ 1470911946648170500
item.description: Acceder a Datos Abiertos es un derecho ciudadano. Hoy presentamos el Portal de Datos Abiertos con 400 conjuntos de datos de 70 entidades fomentando la transparencia y participación. La data es el "nuevo petróleo" porque permite tomar decisiones y aporta al #EcuadorDigital2025. https://t.co/cj4zGvP7yC

item.title: #en @ 1470906269972189184
item.description: @tylerblack32 @Adnama44297406 @StoneColdPillar @CDCgov @TheAtlantic @edyong209 @washingtonpost @nytimes @NYTHealth @latimes @latimeshealth @CDCDirector @lapublichealth This is wildly inaccurate. WONDER is the querying system for the VAERS data. They are one and the same. It's like using Excel to open data. It's not magically different data because i used Excel instead of Access or SQL

item.description:
Hey #opendata twitter! Eind dit jaar verander ik van job en ga ik werken voor het mobiliteitsbedrijf van @Stadgent (Uiteraard nog rond/met (open) data)!
Heel trots op wat we hebben kunnen doen met @OpenDataGent de voorbije jaren. Heel benieuwd wat de komende jaren gaan brengen. https://t.co/gPIQrEqxav

item.title: #en @ 1470761226657574920
item.description:
What is a Data Note?
Data Notes are an article type offered on ORE which allows researchers to describe their scientific dataset, ensuring they get both recognition and credit for their data.
Learn more: https://t.co/wbBo90Hy0q
#DataNote #OpenData #OpenScience https://t.co/ll27Z6wlG5

item.title: #pl @ 1470757223643193355
item.description: Chwalimy się!😎 Ciężką pracą udało się nam osiągnąć kolejny awans w rankingu Komisji Europejskiej badającym poziom otwierania danych w krajach UE. W najnowszym Open Data Maturity 2021 awansowaliśmy o kolejne dwa miejsca (z 6 na 4) i jesteśmy w gronie najlepszych w Europie!💪🇵🇱 https://t.co/suDRSTYIPE
